participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, Larry enjoys sharing his culinary skills and loves the outdoors.
participant_1.background: if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water. spiderman is my favorite. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. l also love comic books. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Determined and straightforward, Jake values discipline and enjoys exploring different cuisines.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.

content.text: Hey! Are you a chef? Because I am.
